channel.title: Comments on: Grab em by the Shorts

item.title: By: Gordon Murray
item.dc:creator: Gordon Murray
item.description:
Hi David,
Cool! I didn't even know about that!
Fixed the typo, Oops.
item.content:encoded:
Hi David,

Cool! I didn’t even know about that!

Fixed the typo, Oops.

item.title: By: David Coallier
item.dc:creator: David Coallier
item.description: Oh yeah and my name is spelt wrong :D It's CoAllier
item.content:encoded: Oh yeah and my name is spelt wrong It’s CoAllier

item.title: By: David Coallier
item.dc:creator: David Coallier
item.description: You can also sort your public links if you click either on the "Clicks" or "URL" (IE: http://short.ie/links/davidcoallier - click on the "Clicks" column)
item.content:encoded: You can also sort your public links if you click either on the “Clicks” or “URL” (IE: http://short.ie/links/davidcoallier – click on the “Clicks” column)
